heronarts.lx.modulator
Class LXModulator

java.lang.Object
  heronarts.lx.modulator.LXModulator
Direct Known Subclasses:
Accelerator, Click, LinearEnvelope, QuadraticEnvelope, SawLFO, SinLFO, SquareLFO, TriangleLFO
public abstract class LXModulator
extends Object

A Modulator is an abstraction for a variable with a value that varies over time, such as an envelope or a low frequency oscillator. Some modulators run continuously, others may halt after they reach a certain value.

 LXModulator stop()
          Pauses the modulator wherever it is.
abstract  LXModulator trigger()
          Invoking the trigger() method restarts a modulator from its initial value, and should also start the modulator if it is not already running.

Constructor Detail

LXModulator

public LXModulator()
Method Detail

start

public LXModulator start()
Sets the Modulator in motion

stop

public LXModulator stop()
Pauses the modulator wherever it is. Internal state should be maintained. A subsequent call to start() should result in the Modulator continuing as it was running before.

isRunning

public boolean isRunning()
Indicates whether this modulator is running.

trigger

public abstract LXModulator trigger()
Invoking the trigger() method restarts a modulator from its initial value, and should also start the modulator if it is not already running.

getValue

public double getValue()
Retrieves the current value of the modulator in full precision

Returns:
Current value of the modulator

getValuef

public final float getValuef()
Retrieves the current value of the modulator in floating point precision, useful when working directly with processing graphics libraries

Returns:
Current value of the modulator, cast to float

setValue

public LXModulator setValue(double value)
Set the modulator to a certain value in its cycle.

Parameters:
value - The value to apply
Returns:
This modulator, for method chaining

setDuration

public abstract LXModulator setDuration(double durationMs)
Modify the duration of this modulator

Parameters:
durationMs - New duration, in milliseconds
Returns:
Modulator, for method chaining;

modulateDurationBy

public final LXModulator modulateDurationBy(LXModulator durationModulator)
Sets another modulator to modulate the speed of this modulator

Parameters:
durationModulator - Another modulator, which will update the duration
Returns:
This modulator, for method chaining

run

public final void run(int deltaMs)
Applies updates to the modulator for the specified number of milliseconds. This method is invoked by the core engine.

Parameters:
deltaMs - Milliseconds to advance by
